contentrichtext.text: {{selfref|For the Wikipedia snowball clause, see [[WP:SNOW]]}} {{wiktionary|snow}} '''[[Snow]]''' is precipitation in the form of crystalline water ice. '''Snow''' may also refer to: {{TOC right}} == Fictional characters == * [[Snow (The Warriors)|Snow (''The Warriors'')]], a gang member in the 1979 film ''The Warriors'' * [[Mr. Snow]], a character in the children's book series ''Mr. Men'' * [[President Coriolanus Snow]], a character in ''The Hunger Games'' trilogy and related media * [[Princess Snow]], a character in the manga ''MÄR'' * [[Jon Snow (A Song of Ice and Fire)|Jon Snow (''A Song of Ice and Fire'')]], a character in the novel series ''A Song of Ice and Fire'' by George R. R. Martin, and in the adapted TV series ''Game of Thrones'' == Film == * [[Snow (1963 film)|''Snow'' (1963 film)]], a UK documentary short by Geoffrey Jones * ''[[Snow: The Movie]]'', a 1982 Australian comedy * [[Snow (2004 film)|''Snow'' (2004 film)]], a Christmas-themed American television film * [[Snow (2008 film)|''Snow'' (2008 film)]], a Bosnian film by Aida Begić ==Literature== * [[Snow (comics)|''Snow'' (comics)]], an English-language manga by Morgan Luthi * [[The Snow (novel)|''The Snow'' (novel)]], a 2004 science fiction novel by Adam Roberts * [[Snow (Malfi novel)|''Snow'' (Malfi novel)]], a 2010 novel by Ronald Malfi * [[Snow (Pamuk novel)|''Snow'' (Pamuk novel)]], a 2002 novel by Orhan Pamuk * [[Snow (Beattie short story)|"Snow" (Beattie short story)]], a 1986 story by Ann Beattie * [[Snow (Butler short story)|"Snow" (Butler short story)]], a 1991 story by Robert Olen Butler * [[Snow (Crowley short story)|"Snow" (Crowley short story)]], a 1985 story by John Crowley == People == * [[Snow (surname)]], including a list of people with the surname Snow or Snowe * [[Snow (musician)]] (born 1969), Canadian reggae musician * [[Snow (Japanese singer)]] (born 1985), Japanese pop singer * [[Arthur Owens]] (1899-1957), given the code name SNOW by MI5, a double-agent during World War II == Music == * [[Snow (Curt Kirkwood album)|''Snow'' (Curt Kirkwood album)]], 2005 * [[Snow (Spock's Beard album)|''Snow'' (Spock's Beard album)]], 2002 * [[Snow (EP)|''Snow'' (EP)]], a 1990 EP by the Cocteau Twins * "[[Snow (Hey Oh)]]", a 2006 song by the Red Hot Chili Peppers * "[[The Snow]]", a 1991 song by Coil * "Snow", a song by JJ72 from ''[[JJ72 (album)|JJ72]]'' ==Other uses== * [[SNOW]], a stream cipher * [[Snow (dessert)]], two types of dessert * [[Snow (ship)]], a type of two-masted sailing vessel * [[Snow (visual novel)|''Snow'' (visual novel)]], a 2003 Japanese adult visual novel * [[Snow beer]], a brand of beer in China *[[Snow, Kentucky]] * [[Snow, Oklahoma]], U.S. * [[Snow College]], Ephraim, Utah, U.S. * [[John Snow College]], a college of the University of Durham * [[Cocaine]] or snow, a crystalline tropane alkaloid obtained from the leaves of the coca plant * [[Noise (video)]] or snow, white noise on an analog video or television display * Snow, a codec originating from the [[FFmpeg]] project == See also == * [[Snow Lake (disambiguation)]] * [[Snow Mountain (disambiguation)]] * [[Snowfall (disambiguation)]] * [[Snowflake (disambiguation)]] {{disambiguation}}
